data.prayer: Spirit, help the 21,954 believers find a person of peace today among the 453,446 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Transnistria, Moldova
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 21,954 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 21,954 believers in Transnistria.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 21,954 believers living in the state of Transnistria. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Transnistria, Moldova to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 21,954 believers in the state of Transnistria with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Lord, there are 336,876 people in the state of Transnistria who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness
